TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Constellation activity. Constellation is an offline planetarium that lets you see what is visible in the sky from any location on Earth
TutoAddContent: Click here to move forward the sky by 1 day
TutoMinusContent: Click here to move backward the sky by 1 day
TutoConstContent: Click here to toggle display of constellations
TutoStarContent: Click here to toggle display of star names
TutoLocationContent: Click here to set the sky to your current location
TutoWorldContent: Click here to select a country. You will see how the sky above this country looks
TutoViewContent: Click here to choose projection type. It will change the way the sky is displayed
TutoTimeContent: Here you can see the date and time for which the sky is shown
